title: BMetal(R)evo FREE2 Watch Face
summary: Analog watchface with 6 bright, 4 dimmed colors, calendar events, weather
description: This is a WatchMaker design and so the free WatchMaker App must be installed onto your device before installing this watch face. WatchMaker can be found here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfYThis is FREE2 version of Darkle BlackMetal (R)evolution  ver.2.77 watchfaceBright mode options :- Time- Day- Date- Month- Current Weather- Watch battery reading - Phone battery reading (if battery reading is < 25 then text changing to red)- Watch and Phone battery led lights (going green->yellow->red)- 6 different color choices (colorset button)- calendar events (with tilted display)- calendar events color wheels (user can change colors)- clockhands,texts and watchdetails animations- user can hide unwanted watch details (like date, weekday, clockhands, pixelgrid ... )- Optimized images, indexed colors, pngslim packed (for better battery life)Dimmed mode options :- 4 different color choices- 5 different brightness options- pixel grid, which can be enabled or disabled (default is enabled)- 12 or 24 hours mode option (default is 12h)- user can hide unwanted watch details (like date, weekday, clockhands, pixelgrid ... )- You can choose whether to show the digital clock, analog clock, or both- animationsif you use animations, then for smoother animation Watchmaker settings should be :(icon top left) Settings -> Watch -> Max Frame Rate = 50
descriptionHTML:
This is a WatchMaker design and so the free WatchMaker App must be installed onto your device before installing this watch face. WatchMaker can be found here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

This is FREE2 version of Darkle BlackMetal (R)evolution ver.2.77 watchface

Bright mode options :

- Time
- Day
- Date
- Month
- Current Weather
- Watch battery reading
- Phone battery reading (if battery reading is < 25 then text changing to red)
- Watch and Phone battery led lights (going green->yellow->red)
- 6 different color choices (colorset button)
- calendar events (with tilted display)
- calendar events color wheels (user can change colors)
- clockhands,texts and watchdetails animations
- user can hide unwanted watch details (like date, weekday, clockhands, pixelgrid ... )
- Optimized images, indexed colors, pngslim packed (for better battery life)

Dimmed mode options :

- 4 different color choices
- 5 different brightness options
- pixel grid, which can be enabled or disabled (default is enabled)
- 12 or 24 hours mode option (default is 12h)
- user can hide unwanted watch details (like date, weekday, clockhands, pixelgrid ... )
- You can choose whether to show the digital clock, analog clock, or both
- animations

if you use animations, then for smoother animation Watchmaker settings should be :
(icon top left) Settings -> Watch -> Max Frame Rate = 50
comments: Love it well done. Love the face one of the gorgeous faces.though the animation is a bit slow as well as response of touches.
recentChanges: + 1 hour away calendar info visible (with text "Starts after xx min")
- bright screen 7th calendar events was not visible
- repeating calendar info was not visible
currently unrecoverable error (watchmaker bug), it can not be repaired - weather update resets all user settings
